title: I told 'em exactly how to do it
creator_credit: Sam Weiss, Irvine H. Millgate, Stephen Bosustow, Hoffman-La Roche and Stephen Bosustow Productions
brief_description: Uses a series of dramatised incidents involving a plant foreman and his attempts to communicate his wishes to his workers in order to stimulate discussion about the communication problems between supervisors and workers.
